title: Top Russian general shot in Moscow as talks stall on Ukraine ceasefire
summary_full: Lt. Gen. Vladimir Alekseyev, the deputy head of the GRU, Russia’s main foreign military intelligence agency, was targeted at his home in Moscow, officials said.
summary_public: Lt. Gen. Vladimir Alekseyev, the deputy head of the GRU, Russia’s main foreign military intelligence agency, was targeted at his home in Moscow, officials said.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Top Russian general shot in Moscow as talks stall on Ukraine ceasefire
